name: part_005
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】Lapis Lazuli ⧸ 重大告知アリ！【 #鷹嶺ルイ重大告知LIVE 】 [PHrZ_dRSy_4]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui performing the song 'CHARISMA'. Energetic, electro-swing style track.
The stage goes dark. Transition to the next song.
Takane Lui performing the song 'FIRST CRY'. Emotional, rock-ballad style track.

subtitles.original: Shoo be do be do doo...
subtitles.english: Shoo be do be do doo...

subtitles.original: 今日もひみつの Take off
subtitles.english: Today too, a secret take off.

subtitles.original: 立派なこの羽根に
subtitles.english: On these magnificent wings,

subtitles.original: 泥をつけて貼って剥がして
subtitles.english: smearing mud, pasting and peeling.

subtitles.original: 理想 萎えた爪立てて
subtitles.english: Digging in my withered claws of ideals,

subtitles.original: 信じられるものは
subtitles.english: believing that the only thing

subtitles.original: 自分だけだと思い込んで
subtitles.english: I could trust was myself,

subtitles.original: 進み続けた
subtitles.english: I kept moving forward.

subtitles.original: あの子みたいにすれば？
subtitles.english: "Why not be like that girl?"

subtitles.original: 君じゃそれは無理だ
subtitles.english: "That's impossible for you."

subtitles.original: 言わせておけばいいさ
subtitles.english: Just let them say whatever they want.

subtitles.original: だって独り 逆境の世紀
subtitles.english: Because I'm alone in this century of adversity,

subtitles.original: 愛すら空回って
subtitles.english: where even love spins in vain.

subtitles.original: 私の邪魔させやしない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get in my way.

subtitles.original: Like a Takane 見据えた神
subtitles.english: Like a Takane, the god I gazed at.

subtitles.original: 穴蔵から空へ
subtitles.english: From the burrow to the sky.

subtitles.original: 飛んでいく私を見ないなんて
subtitles.english: How can you not watch me fly away?

subtitles.original: Bad boy
subtitles.english: Bad boy

subtitles.original: 失敗は止まった時
subtitles.english: Failure is when you stop.

subtitles.original: 今日も挑み張っての
subtitles.english: Today too, I'm challenging and striving.

subtitles.original: 意味のないものはないと
subtitles.english: Believing there's nothing meaningless,

subtitles.original: 信じられるものを見つけ出すまで
subtitles.english: until I find something I can believe in,

subtitles.original: どんな日だって
subtitles.english: no matter what kind of day it is,

subtitles.original: 笑い飛ばすんだ
subtitles.english: I'll laugh it off.

subtitles.original: Na ni na ni na Na ni na ni na
subtitles.english: Na ni na ni na Na ni na ni na

subtitles.original: La la la ta rat ta ta
subtitles.english: La la la ta rat ta ta

subtitles.original: Na ni na ni na Na ni na ni na
subtitles.english: Na ni na ni na Na ni na ni na

subtitles.original: La la la la
subtitles.english: La la la la

subtitles.original: あの子はもう終わりだ
subtitles.english: "That girl is finished."

subtitles.original: これ以上はないね
subtitles.english: "She can't go any further."

subtitles.original: 言わせておけばいいさ
subtitles.english: Just let them say whatever they want.

subtitles.original: いつの日か 寝ても覚めても
subtitles.english: Someday, awake or asleep,

subtitles.original: 夢見てた大歓声
subtitles.english: that great applause I dreamed of...

subtitles.original: 私はここで死にたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to die here!

subtitles.original: 一緒の旅 逆境の世紀
subtitles.english: A journey together in this century of adversity,

subtitles.original: 愛すら空回って
subtitles.english: where even love spins in vain.

subtitles.original: 私の邪魔させやしない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get in my way.

subtitles.original: Like a Takane 見据えた神
subtitles.english: Like a Takane, the god I gazed at.

subtitles.original: 穴蔵から空へ
subtitles.english: From the burrow to the sky.

subtitles.original: 飛んでいく私を見ないなんて
subtitles.english: How can you not watch me fly away?

subtitles.original: Bad boy
subtitles.english: Bad boy

subtitles.original: Bad boy...
subtitles.english: Bad boy...

subtitles.original: 誰かに言われなくたって
subtitles.english: Even if no one tells me,

subtitles.original: 私の方が もっと嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate it more than anyone.

subtitles.original: うるさいな
subtitles.english: Shut up.

subtitles.original: 騒がしい視界を塞いで
subtitles.english: Blocking the noisy view,

subtitles.original: 惨めな理由を書き連ねる
subtitles.english: I list up miserable reasons.

subtitles.original: 教室にずっと居残り
subtitles.english: Staying behind in the classroom forever,

subtitles.original: 窓の向こうに黒い影があって
subtitles.english: there was a black shadow beyond the window,

subtitles.original: 何も言わずにこっちを見ていた
subtitles.english: looking at me without saying a word.

subtitles.original: 私は貴方に救われたくて 泣くんじゃない
subtitles.english: I'm not crying because I want to be saved by you.

subtitles.original: 産声は止められないもの
subtitles.english: A first cry is something that cannot be stopped.

subtitles.original: 何千回ともう一度 死に損ないを
subtitles.english: Thousands of times, and once more, surviving death,

subtitles.original: 希望と絶望の真ん中を纏って
subtitles.english: wrapped in the middle of hope and despair.

subtitles.original: 醜い光を許したのは
subtitles.english: The one who forgave the ugly light

subtitles.original: 他ならない私だった
subtitles.english: was none other than myself.

subtitles.original: 息をして
subtitles.english: Breathe.

subtitles.original: 目を開けて
subtitles.english: Open your eyes.

subtitles.original: これが最後かどうか
subtitles.english: Whether this is the last time,

subtitles.original: 知る術はないよ
subtitles.english: there's no way to know.

subtitles.original: 知りたくもないよ
subtitles.english: I don't even want to know.

subtitles.original: 優しいな
subtitles.english: It's so gentle...

subtitles.original: コンコンと闇は寄り添って
subtitles.english: Darkness snuggles up deeply,

subtitles.original: 解けない答えを塗り潰し
subtitles.english: painting over the insoluble answer...
